002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuote;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuoteDraft;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuoteDraftBuilder;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuoteUpdate;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuoteUpdateAction;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuoteUpdateActionBuilder;
013
014public interface ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesRequestBuilderMixin {
015    public ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesPost post(StagedQuoteDraft stagedQuoteDraft);
016
017    public ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
018
019    public default ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesByIDPost update(Versioned<StagedQuote> stagedQuote,
020            java.util.List<StagedQuoteUpdateAction> actions) {
021        return withId(stagedQuote.getId())
022                .post(builder -> StagedQuoteUpdate.builder().version(stagedQuote.getVersion()).actions(actions));
023    }
024
025    public default ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesByIDPost update(Versioned<StagedQuote> stagedQuote,
026            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<StagedQuoteUpdateAction, StagedQuoteUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
027        return withId(stagedQuote.getId()).post(builder -> StagedQuoteUpdate.builder()
028                .version(stagedQuote.getVersion())
029                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(StagedQuoteUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
030    }
031
032    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<StagedQuoteUpdateAction, StagedQuoteUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesByIDPost> update(
033            Versioned<StagedQuote> stagedQuote) {
034        return builder -> withId(stagedQuote.getId()).post(b -> StagedQuoteUpdate.builder()
035                .version(stagedQuote.getVersion())
036                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(StagedQuoteUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
037    }
038
039    public default ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesByIDDelete delete(Versioned<StagedQuote> stagedQuote) {
040        return withId(stagedQuote.getId()).delete().withVersion(stagedQuote.getVersion());
041    }
042
043    public default ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesPost create(StagedQuoteDraft stagedQuoteDraft) {
044        return post(stagedQuoteDraft);
045    }
046
047    public default ByProjectKeyStagedQuotesPost create(UnaryOperator<StagedQuoteDraftBuilder> op) {
048        return post(op.apply(StagedQuoteDraftBuilder.of()).build());
049    }
050}
